title: Spacetrawler: The Human Seat
description: The galaxy is run on Eeb-built technology, which is a great and glorious thing--if you aren't an Eeb. Legally labeled as "less than sentient," they have no hope for liberation except for by the hands and face tentacles of Interplanet Amity, a galactic watchdog group who are about to make their biggest mistake yet--asking for help from the human race.
author: Christopher Baldwin
